Package pantherbuddy.business.controller.action

The package contains all the actions that can be executed.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Action
    Is the interface to excute the action requested by the user.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionFactory
    The class follows the factory pattern and is used to get the specific implementation of the Action class.
    ChangePasswordAction
    Action class for Change Password
    DeleteMessageAction
    Action class for Delete Message
    LoginAction
    Action class for Login.
    LogoutAction
    Action class for Logout.
    PostMessageAction
    Action class for Post Message.
    RecoverPasswordAction
    Action class for Recover Password.
    RegistrationAction
    Action class for Registration.
    ViewMessagesAction
    Represents the view for View Messages.
    ViewProfileAction
    Represents the view for View Profile.

Package pantherbuddy.business.controller.action Description

The package contains all the actions that can be executed.
Author:
ALLAN
